cuff.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a narrow piece of cloth turned upwards at the bottom of a trouser leg
cuff.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: an action in which you hit someone lightly on the head with your hand open
cuff.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: a wide band of metal, leather, plastic etc, worn around the wrist as decoration
cuff.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to hit someone lightly, especially in a friendly way
cuff.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: She cuffed him playfully on the side of the head.
